name: voyageurs
description:
Join this "runner defense" adventure and help the voyageurs reach their destination.


Caution : Due to some compatibility issues we have been unable to publish the web version of the game on itch.io. We recommend you to follow this LINK in order to play it online.


Controls :

and arrows to move
arrow to transfer energy
Hold to absorb and press to repulse enemies
